original_text: Then the women went out of the hole in the rock, and they ran away from that place. They were very upset and they had trouble in their minds. Because they were afraid, they did not say anything to anyone.
korean_text: 여자들이 몹시 놀라 떨며 나와 무덤에서 도망하고 무서워하여 아무에게 아무 말도 하지 못하더라

sentences.original_text: Then the women went out of the hole in the rock
and they ran away from that place
and they had trouble in their minds
they did not say anything to anyone
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 누구에게도 아무 말도 하지 않았습니다
